page.title: 07Village Shop
page.content: The shop carries out trade as a general stores and post office, and provides an important focal point for the village. In the Post Office section, they sell stamps and stationery and also handle the distribution of pensions and family allowances as well as the Girobank accounts for school funds and private individuals. The shop, which has been open for lO years is popular with children as it sells sweets and icecream in addition to a wide range of household goods. Mobile shops include a baker and greengrocer whose vans come round on Fridays, plus the daily milk and paper roundsman and the postman.
